subsection.name: Core Engine
subsection.p:
1. Define DTD's for DataMap, domain and JDBC driver XML files. Support loading of these files and instantiation of corresponding objects.
[Complete: 100%]

2. Support for loading Cayenne configuration files and configuring Cayenne access objects in standalone applications.
[Complete: 100%]

3. Support for loading Cayenne configuration files and configuring Cayenne access objects in web applications. Automatic configuration in containers that implement Servlet Specification 2.3 (Tomcat 4.0.x)
[Complete: 100%]

4. Support for loading Cayenne configuration files and configuring Cayenne access objects in EJB applications (define what exactly needs to be done).
[Complete: 0%]

5. Support for DataObjects generation based on DataMap.
[Complete: 100%]

6. Support for DataObject relationships
[Complete: 100%]

7. Support for creating and translation to SQL of select, insert, delete, update queries.
[Complete: 100%]

8. Hide JDBC differences between different database engines (DbAdapter architecture).
[Complete: 100%]

9. Support for Oracle.
[Complete: 100%]

10. Support for Sybase.
[Complete: 100%]

11. Support for MySQL.
[Complete: 100%]

12. Support for PostgreSQL (may drop it altogether in this release?).
[Complete: 20%]

13. General support for automatic primary key generation.
[Complete: 100%]

14. Write Cayenne UserGuide.
[Complete: 60%]

15. Blob/Clob support.
[Complete: 0%]
16. [Future releases] "To many" relationship ordering support in the map.
17. [Future releases] Arbitrary attributes in selects, direct support for aggregate functions.
18. [Future releases] Add flattened relationships and attributes.
19. [Future releases] Direct support for stored procedures.
20. [Future releases] Optimistic locking support on arbitrary attributes.
21. [Future releases] Add prefetching support to select queries.
22. [Future releases] Add "in memory" evaluation of expressions.
